    • Method Detail

      • leftJoin

        public Table leftJoin(Table.TableOperation rightJoinIndices,
                      boolean compareNullsEqual)
        Joins two tables on the join columns that are passed in. Usage: Table t1 ... Table t2 ... Table result = t1.onColumns(0,1).leftJoin(t2.onColumns(2,3));
        Parameters:
        rightJoinIndices - - Indices of the right table to join on
        compareNullsEqual - - Whether null join-key values should match or not.
        Returns:
        the joined table. The order of the columns returned will be join columns, left non-join columns, right non-join columns.

      • leftSemiJoin

        public Table leftSemiJoin(Table.TableOperation rightJoinIndices,
                          boolean compareNullsEqual)
        Performs a semi-join between a left table and a right table, returning only the rows from the left table that match rows in the right table on the join keys. Usage: Table t1 ... Table t2 ... Table result = t1.onColumns(0,1).leftSemiJoin(t2.onColumns(2,3));
        Parameters:
        rightJoinIndices - - Indices of the right table to join on
        compareNullsEqual - - Whether null join-key values should match or not.
        Returns:
        the left semi-joined table.
